full_summary:
# Supplier Pre-Qualification (RFSA) - Temporary Help Services for the National Capital Region (NCR)

## Contract Details

* **Contract Title (English/French)**: Supplier Pre-Qualification (RFSA) - Temporary Help Services for the National Capital Region (NCR) / Pré-qualification des fournisseurs (DAMA) - Services d'aide temporaire pour la région de la capitale nationale (RCN)
* **Reference Number**: cb-6278-65400524
* **Amendment Number**: 2
* **Solicitation Number**: EN578-172870/D - Amd 007
* **Publication Date**: 2023-06-09
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2028-03-31T14:00:00

## Contract Scope

The Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA) solicitation invites qualified suppliers to participate in the Temporary Help Services (THS) program for the National Capital Region (NCR). The RFSA is a perpetual refresh arrangement, aiming to establish a long-term supply arrangement for various categories of temporary personnel services.

## Region of Opportunity

* **Region**: Canada (National Capital Region (NCR) only)

## Classification Codes

* **NAICS/UNSPSC Code**: 80111600 (Temporary personnel services)

## Selection Criteria

The selection criteria for this RFSA will be based on variations or combinations of the following methods: (1) Competitive, open bidding, and (2) Perpetual refresh arrangement.

## Procedure

 Potential suppliers must submit their bids through the Centralized Professional Services System (CPSS) and follow the instructions provided in the RFSA document and on the CPSS system available at [Centralized Professional Services System (CPSS)](https://www.tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca/app-acq/spc-cps/spc-cps-eng.html).

## Evaluation and Award

Canada may receive arrangements perpetually, but reserves the right to conduct the evaluation of arrangements in cycles, at least quarterly. Once a Supply Arrangement has been awarded, a THS supplier may qualify for additional classifications or streams every quarter.

## Trade Agreements

This RFSA aligns with the following trade agreements:

* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Contact Information

For inquiries or to request documents in English or French, please contact the Supply Arrangement Authority at [TPSGC.DG
